::DrillBit::

He wasn't sure how to do this. He had never done any diplomatic
negotiations before.
"Well, is are factions are to be allined, there will have to be terms.
Do you want it to be a full alliance where are factions are obligated to
help each other, a cease fire, or what? Also why do you need the
alliance and why us?"
